00024 #ifndef REFERENCEABLE_H
00025 #define REFERENCEABLE_H
00026 
00027 #ifndef USE_PCH
00028 #include <glib/gatomic.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 namespace util {
00032 
00033 class Referenceable {
00034   private:
00035     mutable volatile gint M_ref_count;
00036   protected:
00037     Referenceable(void) : M_ref_count(1) { }
00038     virtual ~Referenceable() { }
00039   public:
00040     void reference(void) const { g_atomic_int_inc(&M_ref_count); }
00041     void unreference(void) const { if (g_atomic_int_dec_and_test(&M_ref_count)) delete const_cast<Referenceable*>(this); }
00042 };
00043 
00044 } // namespace util
00045 
00046 #endif  // REFERENCEABLE_H
